title: MoviePass execs misrepresented operations to attract investors, inflate stock price, say prosectors in securities fraud case
dc:creator: Chris Dolmetsch, Bloomberg
description: The men told investors MoviePass’s plan would be profitable but knew it was a “temporary marketing gimmick,” prosecutors say.
content:encoded: The men told investors MoviePass’s plan would be profitable but knew it was a “temporary marketing gimmick,” prosecutors say. Read More
